question: 小包
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>small</kanji> <kanji>bundle</kanji> is merely a <vocabulary>package</vocabulary>. Something big would be a big package, I guess.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading comes from <ja>小</ja> (which is a reading you've seen a couple times now, I'm sure) and <ja>包み</ja>, with the <ja>み</ja> pushed inside the package. Beware of the somewhat weird rendaku. You don't see <ja>づ</ja> too often.
